thread.section_title: Hotel & Spa La Belle Juliette - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A different type of hotel
thread.title_full: A different type of hotel - Review of Hotel & Spa La Belle Juliette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Martin J
title: A different type of hotel
text:
We had an amazing stay at La Belle Juliette, everything from the staff to the interior was top notch a bit pricey but so worth it!
Not ur typical interior but it works and makes sense in the end.
We had a six month, and a 2,5 year old with us and their staff was 100% committed to making there stay a perfect one
